Davids

Demo Eleventy application to showcase a Google Forms based static content posting system.

How it works

  1. Post an entry using this Google Form
  2. This will be stored in a Google Sheet which is published as CSV to Sheety API resulting in this JSON endpoint
  3. Eleventy consumes the data file and publishes it from the _data folder
